com.spartanlaboratories.engine.game

Class Creep

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.spartanlaboratories.engine.structure.StructureObject
      • com.spartanlaboratories.engine.game.GameObject
        • com.spartanlaboratories.engine.game.VisibleObject
          • com.spartanlaboratories.engine.game.Actor
            • com.spartanlaboratories.engine.game.Alive
              • com.spartanlaboratories.engine.game.Creep
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AcceptsInput

    public class Creep
extends Alive
    The Creep object is a special type of alive that is meant to behave like a mindless monster or "creep" that simply follows a set of directions.
    Since:
    Pre-A
    Author:
    Spartak

      • tick

        public boolean tick()
        Description copied from class: GameObject
        Performs one update on the state of this game object. This method is called systematically by the engine and therefore it would be bad practice to call the method externally.
        Overrides:
        tick in class Alive
        Returns:
        whether or not this object is active

      • drawMe

        public boolean drawMe(StandardCamera camera)
               throws Util.NullColorException
        Description copied from class: VisibleObject
        Draws this object as viewed by the given camera. Will return true only if the object is both active and can be seen by the camera (so if it is actually drawn.
        Overrides:

        Parameters:
        camera - - The camera that will be viewing this object.
        Returns:
